skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white noise
Developer Terms of Use
des:
It helps you create an ambience of relaxation and meditation regardless of the location or time!

It relaxes your body and mind to reduce stress and make you feel better!

This is the perfect musical accompaniment for meditation, yoga, tai chi, healing, and complete relaxation.

ROUTINE:
You can make an Alexa routine to activate White Noise when you need to relax. To do this, launch the Alexa app on your phone or tablet and follow the instructions:

1. Tap the hamburger icon in the upper left corner
2. Tap Routines
3. Tap the + icon in the upper right corner to open up a New Routine tab
4. Tap “When this happens” to choose the trigger. For example, your can select Voice and then type “White Noise”
5. Tap “Add action” and select “Skills”
6. Tap Your skills and find the “White Noise” skill in the list
7. Tap “Save” in the upper right corner to create your new routine!

When you're ready to relax, say, “Alexa, Open White Noise”

Your reviews motivate us to build wonderful skills like this one. If you have not already, please show your support by sharing your suggestions at hello@voicegames.co

Also, try our other skill

More Info:
Relaxing Sounds are perfect to help you with deep sleep, meditation, and relaxation. It is the best sound for stress relief. Our calm and relaxing sleep music can be used as background sounds, meditation music, relaxation music, peaceful music, and as sleep sounds. Let the soothing and calming sounds help you relax.
